## 7) Safe change playbook

1. Identify which workflow(s) in Section 3 are affected
2. Locate the canonical implementation in Section 4
3. Check at least TWO other potential locations before making changes
4. Modify canonical code **once**
5. Regenerate artifacts if needed
6. Update `docs/PROJECT_GUIDE.md` if structure or behavior changed
7. Record significant changes in `docs/CHANGELOG_AI.md`
